==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{liushu|i}} – an old man kneeling and praying for long life.

A rather complex character; top cognate to [[生]], bottom [[口]] + [[寸]]. Middle originally similar to older form of [[舛]], now simplified to [[工]].
